204.31.text: The film that changed my life

273.75.text: In a FILMCLUB season about democracy and government,

709.64.text: Our members defy the binary description

713.02.text: of how we so often describe our young.

715.84.text: They are neither feral nor myopically self-absorbed.

722.59.text: negotiating a world with infinite choice,

726.05.text: but little culture of how to find meaningful experience.
